messages.content:
need to refacator all code and make a right patternt for project 

use feature base component

Refactoring project structure to Feature-Based Architecture.
Moving `ui/screens/home` and related specific components from `ui/components/` into `features/home/`.

**Changes:**
1.  Moved `HomeScreen` and `HomeViewModel` to `features/home`.
2.  Moved Home-specific components (Cards, Visuals, Sections, Navigation) to `features/home/components/...`.
3.  Preserved generic UI components in `ui/components`.
4.  Updating package declarations and imports.

messages.content: no the icon for must fill when its active if not active make empty

To fulfill the request of having "Filled" icons for the active state and "Empty" (Outlined) icons for the inactive state, I will create the missing icon variations and update the `HomeBottomBar` logic to switch between them.

**Summary of Changes:**
1.  **Created `ic_nav_home_filled.xml`**: A solid version of the home icon.
2.  **Created `ic_nav_activity_outlined.xml`**: An outlined version of the activity bolt (derived from the existing filled path).
3.  **Created `ic_nav_shop_filled.xml`**: A solid version of the shopping bag.
4.  **Created `ic_nav_profile_filled.xml`**: A solid version of the user profile.
5.  **Updated `HomeComponents.kt`**: Modified `HomeBottomBar` to toggle between the filled and outlined drawable resources based on the selection state.

### New Icon Files

### Code Changes

```kotlin
// app/src/main/java/com/example/thingsappandroid/ui/components/HomeComponents.kt

<<<<<<< SEARCH
@Composable
fun HomeBottomBar(
    selectedTab: Int,
    onTabSelected: (Int) -> Unit
) {
    Column {
        HorizontalDivider(color = Gray100, thickness = 1.dp)
        NavigationBar(
            containerColor = Color.White,
            contentColor = Gray400,
            tonalElevation = 0.dp,
            modifier = Modifier.height(80.dp)
        ) {
            val items = listOf(
                Triple("Home", R.drawable.ic_nav_home, 0),
                Triple("Activity", R.drawable.ic_nav_activity, 1),
                Triple("Shop", R.drawable.ic_nav_shop, 2),
                Triple("Profile", R.drawable.ic_nav_profile, 3)
            )

            items.forEach { (label, iconRes, index) ->
                val isSelected = selectedTab == index
                NavigationBarItem(
                    selected = isSelected,
                    onClick = { onTabSelected(index) },
                    icon = {
                        Icon(
                            painter = painterResource(id = iconRes),
                            contentDescription = label,
                            tint = if (isSelected) ActivityGreen else Gray400,
                            modifier = Modifier.size(28.dp)
                        )
                    },
                    label = {
                        Text(
                            text = label,
                            style = MaterialTheme.typography.labelSmall.copy(
                                fontWeight = FontWeight.SemiBold,
                                fontSize = 11.sp
                            )
                        )
                    },
                    alwaysShowLabel = false, // Hides label when unselected
                    colors = NavigationBarItemDefaults.colors(
                        selectedIconColor = ActivityGreen,
                        selectedTextColor = ActivityGreen,
                        unselectedIconColor = Gray400,
                        unselectedTextColor = Gray400,
                        indicatorColor = Color.Transparent
                    )
                )
            }
        }
    }
}
=======
// Data class to hold icon pairs
private data class BottomNavData(
    val label: String,
    val filledIcon: Int,
    val outlinedIcon: Int,
    val index: Int
)

@Composable
fun HomeBottomBar(
    selectedTab: Int,
    onTabSelected: (Int) -> Unit
) {
    Column {
        HorizontalDivider(color = Gray100, thickness = 1.dp)
        NavigationBar(
            containerColor = Color.White,
            contentColor = Gray400,
            tonalElevation = 0.dp,
            modifier = Modifier.height(80.dp)
        ) {
            val items = listOf(
                BottomNavData("Home", R.drawable.ic_nav_home_filled, R.drawable.ic_nav_home, 0),
                BottomNavData("Activity", R.drawable.ic_nav_activity, R.drawable.ic_nav_activity_outlined, 1),
                BottomNavData("Shop", R.drawable.ic_nav_shop_filled, R.drawable.ic_nav_shop, 2),
                BottomNavData("Profile", R.drawable.ic_nav_profile_filled, R.drawable.ic_nav_profile, 3)
            )

            items.forEach { item ->
                val isSelected = selectedTab == item.index
                // Choose icon based on selection state
                val iconRes = if (isSelected) item.filledIcon else item.outlinedIcon
                
                NavigationBarItem(
                    selected = isSelected,
                    onClick = { onTabSelected(item.index) },
                    icon = {
                        Icon(
                            painter = painterResource(id = iconRes),
                            contentDescription = item.label,
                            tint = if (isSelected) ActivityGreen else Gray400,
                            modifier = Modifier.size(28.dp)
                        )
                    },
                    label = {
                        Text(
                            text = item.label,
                            style = MaterialTheme.typography.labelSmall.copy(
                                fontWeight = FontWeight.SemiBold,
                                fontSize = 11.sp
                            )
                        )
                    },
                    alwaysShowLabel = false, // Hides label when unselected
                    colors = NavigationBarItemDefaults.colors(
                        selectedIconColor = ActivityGreen,
                        selectedTextColor = ActivityGreen,
                        unselectedIconColor = Gray400,
                        unselectedTextColor = Gray400,
                        indicatorColor = Color.Transparent
                    )
                )
            }
        }
    }
}
>>>>>>> REPLACE
```

messages.content: check the image must be like this

Based on the provided image, I will update the bottom navigation bar to match the design. This involves renaming the "Shop" label to "Marketplace" and updating the filled versions of the icons (Shop and Profile) to correctly match the visual style (Shopping Cart instead of Bag, and Person inside Circle instead of just Person).

**Summary of Changes:**
1.  **Updated `ic_nav_shop_filled.xml`**: Replaced the "Shopping Bag" path with a filled "Shopping Cart" path to match the outlined icon and the design.
2.  **Updated `ic_nav_profile_filled.xml`**: Replaced the standalone "Person" path with a filled "Account Circle" path to match the outlined icon and the design.
3.  **Updated `HomeComponents.kt`**: Changed the label for the third tab from "Shop" to "Marketplace".

Summary: Updated `BatteryCard` in `HomeComponents.kt` to use a `Canvas` for drawing the custom battery liquid shape and outline, replacing the simple gradient background. This restores the detailed visual indicator with the wave effect and battery cap.

```kotlin
// app/src/main/java/com/example/thingsappandroid/ui/components/HomeComponents.kt
<<<<<<< SEARCH
            // Visual Battery Indicator (Left side graphic)
            Box(
                modifier = Modifier
                    .align(Alignment.BottomStart)
                    .padding(start = 21.dp, bottom = 21.dp)
                    .width(38.dp)
                    .height(58.dp)
                    .background(
                        brush = Brush.verticalGradient(
                            colors = listOf(BatteryGradientStart, BatteryGradientEnd)
                        ),
                        shape = RoundedCornerShape(2.dp)
                    )
            )
=======
            // Visual Battery Indicator (Left side graphic)
            Box(
                modifier = Modifier
                    .align(Alignment.BottomStart)
                    .padding(start = 21.dp, bottom = 21.dp)
                    .width(38.dp)
                    .height(58.dp)
            ) {
                Canvas(modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()) {
                    val w = size.width
                    val h = size.height
                    // Scale factors based on SVG viewbox 38x58
                    val sX = w / 38f
                    val sY = h / 58f

                    // Liquid Path (from SVG)
                    val liquidPath = Path().apply {
                        moveTo(32.278f * sX, 58f * sY)
                        lineTo(5.722f * sX, 58f * sY)
                        cubicTo(2.561f * sX, 58f * sY, 0f, 56.124f * sY, 0f, 53.811f * sY)
                        lineTo(0f, 6.817f * sY)
                        cubicTo(0f, 2.839f * sY, 2.413f * sX, 1.991f * sY, 5f * sX, 1.326f * sY)
                        cubicTo(9.5f * sX, 0.170f * sY, 14f * sX, -0.275f * sY, 18.5f * sX, 0.170f * sY)
                        cubicTo(23f * sX, 0.615f * sY, 26.222f * sX, 0.615f * sY, 30.5f * sX, 1.949f * sY)
                        cubicTo(33.222f * sX, 2.798f * sY, 38f * sX, 3.729f * sY, 38f * sX, 6.817f * sY)
                        lineTo(38f * sX, 53.811f * sY)
                        cubicTo(38f * sX, 56.124f * sY, 35.439f * sX, 58f * sY, 32.278f * sX, 58f * sY)
                        close()
                    }

                    // Liquid Gradient
                    drawPath(
                        path = liquidPath,
                        brush = Brush.linearGradient(
                            colors = listOf(
                                BatteryGradientStart,
                                BatteryGradientEnd.copy(alpha = 0.5f),
                                BatteryGradientEnd.copy(alpha = 0.7f)
                            ),
                            start = Offset(w / 2, h),
                            end = Offset(w / 2, 0f)
                        )
                    )

                    // Battery Case Outline (Approximation to match visual style)
                    val outlineColor = Color(0xFF404040)
                    val strokeWidth = 2.5.dp.toPx()
                    val inset = strokeWidth / 2

                    // Cap
                    val capWidth = 14.dp.toPx()
                    val capHeight = 3.dp.toPx()
                    drawRoundRect(
                        color = outlineColor,
                        topLeft = Offset((w - capWidth) / 2, 0f),
                        size = Size(capWidth, capHeight),
                        cornerRadius = CornerRadius(1.dp.toPx()),
                        style = Stroke(width = strokeWidth)
                    )

                    // Body
                    val bodyTop = 4.dp.toPx()
                    drawRoundRect(
                        color = outlineColor,
                        topLeft = Offset(inset, bodyTop + inset),
                        size = Size(w - (inset * 2), h - bodyTop - (inset * 2)),
                        cornerRadius = CornerRadius(4.dp.toPx()),
                        style = Stroke(width = strokeWidth)
                    )
                }
            }
>>>>>>> REPLACE
```
